content.question: Which of the following examples best illustrates sensory adaptation?

choices.label: Sam adds salt to the soup he is cooking until he can just taste the salt.
After Joel jumped into a swimming pool, the water felt uncomfortably cold, but after a while the water felt mildly cool.
After taking her medication for years, Avery must increase her dose to get the same effect.
Watching billboard lights flash on and off causes Remi to perceive motion where none exists.

content.answer: After Joel jumped into a swimming pool, the water felt uncomfortably cold, but after a while the water felt mildly cool.
